game.shortDescription: ğŸ‚¡ TWENTYONE ğŸ‚¡ A deadly card game where the stakes are your life. Each opponent has their own twisted rules, and every decision could be your last. The closer you get to 21, the further you fall into madness. Play the game - or let the game play you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: ğŸ‚¡ TWENTYONE ğŸ‚¡ A deadly card game where the stakes are your life. Each opponent has their own twisted rules, and every decision could be your last. The closer you get to 21, the further you fall into madness. Play the game - or let the game play you.
